title: Volkswagen Sets Price Range for Porsche’s Blockbuster I.P.O.
description: The public offering values the luxury sports car maker at up to $75 billion.
dc:creator: Michael J. de la Merced
media:description: An initial public offering would return Porsche — maker of the 911 sports car and the Taycan electric sedan — to the public markets for the first time in a decade.
